lead_paragraph: GALLAGHER--John Joseph, age 77, passed away peacefully on the Fourth of July, 2016. Born in New York City, he was an extraordinary and humorous storyteller, befitting his Irish heritage. Johnny served in the US Navy and continued his love of the sea and boats working in the family business, Gallagher Bros. Sand and Gravel Corp. The second youngest of six siblings, he is survived by his sister Mary Alice Bissell and brother Gerard Bishop Gallagher. John was the husband of Berta Chiari Gallagher, who passed away in 2014, father to Theresa Harris and John Joseph Gallagher Jr. and grandfather to Jessica, Jake, Sean and Josie. 1/3
